DOC.brief_summary: This randomise , control , double blind study compare postoperative setting analgesic efficacy , safety cost two group patient receive postanesthesia care unit either intravenous morphine titration alone intravenous morphine titration combine ketamine .

DOC.detailed_description: Randomised , control , double blind study compare postoperative setting analgesic efficacy , safety cost two group patient receive postanesthesia care unit either intravenous morphine titration alone intravenous morphine titration combine ketamine
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 yr schedule surgery General anesthesia ASA I III Able use VAS No psychological disorder , able speak french Age < 18 yrs Locoregional anesthesia analgesia Allergia morphine ketamine Morphine ketamine contraindication Pregnancy breastfeeding
